document.full_text: the move by the nfl players' union to decertify itself on friday opened the door for legal moves which could take months to resolve but keep alive the hope next season will be saved.
document.title: nfl union moves opens door to litigation
lines_and_colors: the move by the nfl players' union to decertify itself on friday opened the door for legal moves which could take months to resolve but keep alive the hope next season will be saved.
